improvements: Crop slightly to focus more on the people and golden sky
critiques.notes: The photo has a beautiful sunset but is underexposed, particularly in the foreground. Increasing the exposure and bringing out the shadows will reveal more detail.

improvements: enhance contrast to bring out details in the clouds

critiques.notes: The photograph effectively captures a stunning sunset scene with compelling silhouettes. Increasing brightness and contrast will enhance visibility and detail, while cropping will improve compositional balance.
